H0.text: +2 is the electrical charge that a proton has in an atom.

H1.text: +1 is the electrical charge that a proton has in an atom.

H2.text: -1 is the electrical charge of a proton in an atom.

H3.text: -2 is the electrical charge of a proton in an atom.

A4.text: A proton is a stable subatomic particle, symbol p, H+, or 1H+ with a positive electric charge of +1 e (elementary charge).
